message.raw:
Fixed a bug where runmanger was not saving and loading the 'run shots' checkbox
state, and was not loading the 'view shots' one correctly.

Fixed bug where runviewer would not be started on Linux, and had a timeout
too short for computers that are very slow at opening new processes (like the
ones I'm using at the moment, with all their government mandated security scans)
